Necromancer Robe

The Necromancer Robe is specialized equipment for the Necromancer class that enables necromantic abilities, particularly the summoning of deathlings.

Description

This robe is imbued with dark magic and will allow the Necromancer to consume souls of fallen monsters. It allows the Necromancer to summon a Deathling at a cost of 5 souls. The Deathling is an undead minion that grows stronger alongside their master.

Properties

  • Class Restriction: Only Necromancers can use this robe
  • Summoning: Allows summoning one Deathling at a time
  • Soul Cost: Each Deathling requires 5 souls to summon
  • Scaling: Summoned creature grows stronger with hero level
  • Soul Consumption: Enhanced ability to consume souls from defeated enemies

Abilities

  • Deathling Summoning: Summon a Deathling to fight alongside the Necromancer
  • Soul Enhancement: Potentially increases soul yield from defeated enemies
  • Necromantic Focus: May enhance other necromantic abilities

Acquisition

  • Found as treasure in dungeon levels
  • Potentially available in special shops
  • Crafting recipe may exist for Necromancers

Comparison with Other Equipment

  • Necromancer Armor - Allows up to 2 Deathlings instead of just 1
  • Different equipment for different playstyles (quantity vs. other bonuses)

Related Items

  • Necromancer Armor - Alternative equipment with different properties
  • Other necromancer-specific items that enhance soul collection

Related Abilities

  • Necromancy - The magical practice this robe enables
  • Summon Deathling - The spell enabled by this robe
  • Soul consumption mechanics

Strategy

  • Good for Necromancers who prefer to focus on a single powerful minion
  • More efficient soul usage than armor if you only want one Deathling
  • Allows for other equipment choices in armor slot
  • Essential for basic necromantic summoning abilities
